channel.title: Allstarscape v2 source problem?
channel.description:
Well.... There seems to be something wrong with the Allstarscape v2 source. It doesnt let me edit it. The source pities me everyone once and a while and lets me add some npc dialogue and maybe a new npc or object. BUT in most cases when i edit something nothing happens in the game. Is it the compiler or was the Allstarscape source JUST MADE not to let people edit it.
Please post your thoughts.

item.title: Allstarscape v2 source problem?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Is your server shut off when you compile? Because your server and client sometimes needs to be closed, and turned off, then save your stuff and compile. try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape v2 source problem?
item.dc:creator: @theUnforgiven theUnforgiven
item.description:
@theUnforgiven wrote:

The compiler “supposedly” says “compiled succesfully”. But just im pretty sure i am coding right because i tried even adding simple things like npcs and npc dialogue and it would rarely work.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstarscape v2 source problem?
item.dc:creator: @i_f00t0n_i i f00t0n i
item.description:
@i_f00t0n_i wrote:

Never really tried ‘Allstar’, but im pretty sure ‘Mod Allstar’ is an idiot and could not do something like that.

When you compile does it come up with any error? or does it say it was successfull? Are you making sure your code’s are right?
Not sure what else it could be.

Read full topic
